pages.title: facebook login
pages.purpose: To add your own facebook login system to the script you need to create an facebook app. for that follow below steps

now go to facebook login settings area
now go to settings > basic settings
now you have to add your facebook app id and app secret to your website admin panel, for this go to “General Settings > third party scripts”

dependencies_troubleshooting: add your app domain and your email, remember your app domain must be your website url.

pages.title: How To Setup Google Login System In Nexelit
pages.purpose: howto setup google login system in the Nexelit or Any Other xgenious script you have to create google console api credential first. follow below step to get those credentials
ui_paths: go to https://console.cloud.google.com site and login to your gmail account go get access to the google cloud console.
now go to api overview from your project dashboard

now go to your website admin dashboard for add google oAuth client id and client secret, go to “General settings > third Party script” if you see google login disable then enable it and add google oauth crendetials.
steps: howto setup google login system in the Nexelit or Any Other xgenious script you have to create google console api credential first. follow below step to get those credentials
click on credential then select oAuth client ID
if you dod not have o auth consent screen setup you have to setup it first, then you can create a credentials

now go to your website admin dashboard for add google oAuth client id and client secret, go to “General settings > third Party script” if you see google login disable then enable it and add google oauth crendetials.
